about_the_game:
DayZ Tools is a complete tools suite for the Enfusion and Real Virtuality game engine powering DayZ. It allows you to produce your own content for the game.

Key tools
  • Workbench
    This is a powerful all-in-one tool developed to handle modifications related to the Enfusion engine game core such as scripting, particles editing, UI editing, and others.
  • Addon Builder
    The purpose of this tool is to convert all data into formats readable by the game engine and pack them into a single archive.
  • Publisher
    This tool can publish whole Mods onto Steam Workshop to be used in the game.
  • Terrain Builder
    This is a terrain creation tool. It allows users to build their own virtual worlds from scratch.
  • Object Builder
    This tool is used to create, edit and configure 3D models made for DayZ.
  • Central Economy Editor
    This tool is used to configure the spawn and loot spots of a terrain.
